MailTemp.Subject: Welcome to GE Fingerprints System | Agency Registration
MailTemp.Body:
Hi $Name$,
Welcome to the GE Fingerprints System.
Your agency account has been successfully created. Here are the access details:
URL: $Link$
Username (Email): $Emailid$
Password: $Password$
If you have any questions or need support, email us at support@gefingerprints.com
Thank You,
GE Fingerprints Team
